author: nitinbps
body: Size of PowerShell package is ~92 MB. It would be nice to be able to create the package based on the features in PowerShell to reduce the size of the package. This is extremely helpful in scenarios where large number of packages need to be distributed on low bandwidth environment where only limited set of PowerShell functionality is being used.

comments.author: iSazonov

Today package size is not more 40MB ([Releases](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases))

And the package contains only the Powershell core. I cannot imagine that can be removed from it.
